event.title: was named in honor of Edinburgh, Scotland and for many years

data.event: Edinburgh was named in honor of Edinburgh, Scotland and for many years was pronounced the same way.
Edinburgh was laid out in about 1822.
The Edinburgh post office was established in 1823.

event.title: formed rapidly across Central Indiana on the evening of June 3, 2008

data.event: Severe thunderstorms formed rapidly across Central Indiana on the evening of June 3, 2008.
